title: Optimizing the benefit–risk trade-off in nano-agrochemicals through explainable machine learning: beyond concentration
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00213J, Paper
Hengjie Yu, Shiyu Tang, Eslam M. Hamed, Sam F. Y. Li, Yaochu Jin, Fang Cheng
An explainable ML-driven MOO approach is proposed for the benefit–risk trade-off of nano-agrochemicals. Results highlight the importance of considering the well-known concentration-dependent effect in conjunction with other key factors.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
